attributes.additional_details:
P.M David Cameron excepted the vote of the people

Result 51.9%  voted leave

Only London Scotland and Northern Ireland voted to remain

Turnout 72%

Out of 12 uk nations and regions LEAVE won 9

Every person who voted in the referendum made their own decision made their own vote

Respect the vote and except the vote
attributes.background:
on the 23rd  June 2016 the great British public went to the polls to decide wether to LEAVE or REMAIN in the EU, the result ended with a win for LEAVE 
The remain voters must except this decision
